biography_text: WALDEN, Greg, a Representative from Oregon; born in The Dalles, Wasco County, Ore., January 10, 1957; B.S., University of Oregon, Eugene, Ore., 1981; member of the Oregon state house of representatives, 1989-1995; member of the Oregon state senate, 1995-1997; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixth and to the nine succeeding Congresses (January 3, 1999-present); chair, Committee on Energy & Commerce (One Hundred Fifteenth Congress).
